Time.description: Time-relevant qMRLab model output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
Time.requirement: Any output variable name of a qMRLab model (FitResults.x) that describes time (e.g. FitResults.T1), whether required or optional (e.g. FitResults.T1prime), MUST be listed here.
Time.warning_outputs: The outputs field MUST be a unique array. Concatenatoion of outputs arrays of all namespaces (e.g. [Time.outputs, Rate.outputs] MUST yield a unique array as well.
Time.warning_addition: Please append to the lists, do NOT prepend. Make sure that you append an entry to all subfields (qMapNames, suffixBIDS, isOfficialBIDS, folderBIDS)
Time.warning_qMapNames: Please be descriptive and omit abbreviations (e.g. DO exclude (s) or (ms) etc.)
qMapNames: Longitudinal relaxation time (T1) map
Longitudinal relaxation time (T1) map
Transverse relaxation time (T1) map
Transverse relaxation time (T1) map
Spin relaxation time (T2) for intra/extracellular water (IEW)
Spin relaxation time (T2) myelin water (MW)
Tranverse relaxation time (T2) of the free (f) pool
Tranverse relaxation time (T2) of the restricted (r) pool
Time.warning_suffixBIDS: The suffixBIDS field does NOT have to be a unique array, however, MUST respect the correcsponding BIDS suffix (if available) & the respective outputs entry.
Time.warning_folderBIDS: Anything that is not dwi or fmap is anat. At least as of 2021 (BIDS v1.5.0).

Rate.description: Rate-relevant qMRLab model output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
Rate.requirement: Any output variable name of a qMRLab model (FitResults.x) that describes rate (e.g. FitResults.R1), whether required or optional (e.g. FitResults.R1f), MUST be listed here.
qMapNames: Longitidunal relaxation rate (R1) map
Longitidunal relaxation rate (R1) of the restricted (r) pool
Longitidunal relaxation rate (R1) of the free (f) pool
Exchange rate from the restricted to the free pool (kf: r --> f)
Exchange rate from the free to the restricted pool (kr: f --> r)

Fraction.description: Any qMRLab model output (FitResults.my_output) variable (my_output) that defines ratio MUST be defined in this namespace.
Fraction.requirement: Any output variable name of a qMRLab model (FitResults.x) that describes fraction (e.g. FitResults.MTR), whether required or optional (e.g. FitResults.kf), MUST be listed here.
qMapNames: Magnetization Transfer Ratio (MTR) map
Myelin Water Fraction (MWF) map
Ratio of number of restricted (r) pool to free (f) pool, defined as F = M0r/M0f = kf/kr. Also known as macromolecular pool fraction (MPF)
Instantaneous fraction of magnetization after vs. before the pulse in the free pool. Starting point is computed using Bloch simulation
Instantaneous fraction of magnetization after vs. before the pulse in the restricted pool. Starting point is computed using Bloch simulation
Fraction of water in the restricted compartment: (f)raction of (i)ntra (c)ellular (v)olume.
Fraction of water in the (iso)tropic compartment (for example, CSF/Veins)
Fraction of restricted (r) water in the entire voxel (for example, intra-cellular volume fraction) fr = ficvf*(1-fiso)
Fraction of isotropically restricted compartment (Dot for ex vivo model): (i)sotropic (r)estricted (frac)tion
Fraction of water in the CSF compartment. (fixed to 0 by default)
Fraction of water in the hindered (h) compartment, calculated as: 1 - fr - fcsf

B1.description: Transmit RF field mapping models' B1+ output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
B1.requirement: Any output variable name of a qMRLab model (FitResults.x) that describes B1+ (e.g. FitResults.B1map), whether required or optional (e.g. FitResults.B1map_filtered), MUST be listed here.
qMapNames: RF transmit field (B1+) map
Smoothed B1+ field map using Gaussian, Median, Spline or polynomial filter (see FilterClass.m for more info)
Smoothed B1+ field map.

B0.description: Magnetic field inhomonegeity mapping models' B0-relevant output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Static main magnetic field (B0) inhomogeneity map

Susceptibility.decription: QSM models' susceptibility output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Quantitative susceptibility map created using Split-Bregman method without magnitude weighting
Quantitative susceptibility map created using Split-Bregman method with magnitude weighting
Quantitative susceptibility map created using L2 regularization without magnitude weighting
Quantitative susceptibility map created using L2 regularization with magnitude weighting
Quantitative susceptibility map created without regularization

Angle.description: Phase output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Unwrapped phase image
Azimuth angle of the fibers
Elevation of the fibers
Unwrapped phase image

Diffusivity.decription: Diffusivity output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Diffusion coefficient in the restricted compartment
Diffusion coefficient of the isotropic compartment (CSF)
Apparent diffusion coefficient of the hindered (h) compartment
Diffusion coefficient of the isotropic compartment (CSF)
Diffusion coefficient of the intra-axonal (totally restricted) compartment

Arbitrary.decription: Any output of arbitrary unit (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output) are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Orientation dispersion index derived from concentration parameter of Watson distribution
Concentration parameter of Watson distribution
Signal at b=0
Fitting residuals
1rst eigenvalue of D
2nd eigenvalue of D
3rd eigenvalue of D
Fractional Anisotropy: FA = sqrt(3/2)*sqrt(sum((L-L_mean).^2))/sqrt(sum(L.^2))
Signal at b=0 at TE=XX
Map of datapoints that were set to 1 prior to smoothing
Map of datapoints that were set to 1 prior to smoothing
MT saturation map (%), T1-corrected
Equilibrium value of the free pool longitudinal magnetization
Equilibrium value of the restricted pool longitudinal magnetization
Equilibrium magnetization
Fitting residual
Arbitrary fit parameter (S=a + b*exp(-TI/T1))
Arbitrary fit parameter (S=a + b*exp(-TI/T1))
Fitting residual
MP2RAGE UNI image corrected for B1+ bias if B1map is provided
MP2RAGE UNI image calculated using input data (if mag,phase,inv1,inv2 available) in qMRLab. Not the one Siemens calculates inline.
Macromolecular Tissue Volume (normal values in the brain range [0 0.4])
Reception profile of the antenna (B1- map)
Length of coherence. Interpretation is not perfectly known, experimental.
4D denoised data
standard deviation of the rician noise
eta parameter of noise estimation
N parameter of noise estimation
standard deviation of the rician noise
Likelihood of the values of the objective function for each parameter combination in the grid search.

Categorical.decription: Categorical output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output), such as segmentation regions, are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Clustering of the eroded input mask in four categories: 1: Gray Matter 2: Deep Gray 3: White matter (used for Coil Gain) 4: CSF
Index of the last polarity restored datapoint (only used for magnitude data)
Binary mask (maskSharp, gradientMask or same as the input)
CSF mask.

Length.decription: Length output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output), such as axon diameter, are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: Mean axonal diameter weighted by the axonal area --> biased toward the larger axons. RECOMMENDED Gmax >= 300mT/m

Tensor.decription: Tensor output (FitResults.my_output) variables (my_output), such as DT, are defined in this namespace.
qMapNames: [Dxx Dxy Dxz Dxy Dyy Dyz Dxz Dyz Dzz] Diffusion Tensor
